name: Home Office Frenzy
description:
Description

This game was our entry for the GMTK 2021 Jam.  The game was made using Unity.

Its 2021.  How long have you been working from home?  The constant calls, the annoying technical issues,  looking at the same room all day: it's driven you mad.

One day, on a regular call to a client, you snap! 

Take out your rage on the contents of you're room as quickly as you can, make sure nothing is untouched!

Notes: - Best played in full-screen - Main Menu is a playground to get used to the controls - Windows build is max graphics and glow, WebGL is downgraded Controls

> W, A, S, D - Move Around

> E - Interact

> ESC - Exit from full-screen

Gameplay

> Knock as many items on the floor as you can before the 60 seconds run out!

> Interact with annoying object to shut them up!

Install instructions

1. Download the desired file

2. Extract the .zip file into a folder of your choice

3. Open up the exe (or whatever your system uses) inside and have fun!

Credits

Kenny (Models) - https://kenney.nl/assets/furniture-kit, https://www.kenney.nl/assets/food-kit

Motor Oil 1937 M54 (Font) - www.ffonts.net

Post your best scores below!
